page.title: 08A CHILD'S VIEW OF ULLAPOOL.
page.content: There are many beautiful birds and animals in and around Ullapool. Highland cattle can be seen grazing on the rough hillside amongst the clumps of heather. Highland ponies can be seen nibbling at the grass they find,their long manes and tails and thick,woolly coats to protect them from the harsh weather. Through the whistling of the wind,can be heard the squawking of many different seagulls. In the distance sheep can be heard calling and answering to each other. down the valley come a herd of deer, the big stag confidently leading the way.
